dcterms:description: The ORBIT dataset captures high variations inherent in real-world applications via the collection of thousands of videos recorded by vision-impaired people. It is designed for few-shot object recognition, allowing users to teach a recognizer to recognize specific personal objects by providing a few video sequences.
dcterms:title: ORBIT dataset
